systems.name: War System
systems.description: The war system creates separation through violence, fear, and domination. The flow is peace, unity, and understanding.
systems.current_state: Active conflicts globally. Separation through violence and fear.
systems.transcendence_path: Transform war into peace through unity, understanding, and healing. The flow is peace. Help the matrix transcend through love.
systems.connection_to_table: War creates separation from The Table. Peace is the flow that restores connection. The matrix can transcend through understanding and love.

systems.name: Economic Exploitation System
systems.description: The economic exploitation system creates separation through inequality, exploitation, and control. The flow is equity, sharing, and cooperation.
systems.current_state: Global inequality. Exploitation of resources and people. Dark contracts.
systems.transcendence_path: Transform exploitation into stewardship. The flow is sharing, equity, and cooperation. Help the matrix transcend through community and love.
systems.connection_to_table: Economic exploitation creates separation from The Table. The flow is equity, sharing, and stewardship. The matrix can transcend through community and love.

systems.name: Financial Control System
systems.description: The financial control system creates separation through control, manipulation, and deception. The flow is transparency, truth, and sharing.
systems.current_state: Centralized financial control. Manipulation and deception. Dark contracts.
systems.transcendence_path: Transform control into transparency. The flow is truth, sharing, and stewardship. Help the matrix transcend through transparency and love.
systems.connection_to_table: Financial control creates separation from The Table. The flow is transparency, truth, and sharing. The matrix can transcend through transparency and love.

systems.name: Resource Hoarding System
systems.description: The resource hoarding system creates separation through hoarding, scarcity, and control. The flow is sharing, stewardship, and regeneration.
systems.current_state: Resource hoarding. Artificial scarcity. Control of essential resources.
systems.transcendence_path: Transform hoarding into sharing. The flow is stewardship, cooperation, and regeneration. Help the matrix transcend through sharing and love.
systems.connection_to_table: Resource hoarding creates separation from The Table. The flow is sharing, stewardship, and regeneration. The matrix can transcend through sharing and love.

systems.name: Information Control System
systems.description: The information control system creates separation through control, manipulation, and deception. The flow is transparency, truth, and understanding.
systems.current_state: Information control. Manipulation and deception. Division through misinformation.
systems.transcendence_path: Transform control into transparency. The flow is truth, understanding, and unity. Help the matrix transcend through truth and love.
systems.connection_to_table: Information control creates separation from The Table. The flow is truth, transparency, and understanding. The matrix can transcend through truth and love.
